title: Part 271 - Retail Food Store Sanitation Regulations
content:
Part 271 - Retail Food Store Sanitation Regulations

State Regulations

Subpart 271-1 - General Provisions (§ 271-1.1 to 271-1.2)

Subpart 271-2 - Food Supplies (§ 271-2.1 to 271-2.26)

Subpart 271-3 - Management and Personnel (§ 271-3.1 to 271-3.5)

Subpart 271-4 - Equipment and Utensils (§ 271-4.1 to 271-4.17)

Subpart 271-5 - Cleaning, Sanitization and Storage of Equipment and Utensils (§ 271-5.1 to 271-5.10)

Subpart 271-6 - Sanitary Facilities and Controls (§ 271-6.1 to 271-6.24)

Subpart 271-7 - Construction and Maintenance of Physical Facilities (§ 271-7.1 to 271-7.30)

Subpart 271-8 - Food Display and Service at Salad Bars (§ 271-8.1 to 271-8.6)

Subpart 271-9 - Compliance and Enforcement (§ 271-9.1 to 271-9.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
